glosses: to take offense from, to be offended by, to sulk, take offense and not to speak with someone

examples.text: boşandıktan sonra anne ve baba birbirine küsmüştüler.
examples.translation: after divorcing, the parents were no longer on speaking terms with one another.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish كوسمك (küsmek), from Early Old Oghuz كُسْماكْ (kusmʾk /⁠küsmek⁠/, “to be angry, offended”). Cognate to Azerbaijani küsmək, Gagauz küsmää.
